CHAT.comment: CORDELL PEARSON, ET AL., Petitioners v. AFTON CALLAHAN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:08 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER STIRBA, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE P. METZLER, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT BY PETER STIRBA, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
